name: ChatAid (itch) (Mia Blais-Côté) (Mia Blais-Côté) (Mia Blais-Côté)
description:
When you found a wacky program on your PC called “ChatAid”, you ended up in a chatroom. Someone needs your help.  

A very short story and visual novel-lite written in Ren’py, in Two Parts, with 4 endings in total (two per part). You can choose your name, nickname and gender. 

A even shorter sequel with Alice Lorange, called "ChatAid: Here I go again!" is included.
